author: Dheshni
title: IDLES POP POP POP Lyrics know the real meaning of IDLES POP POP POP Song lyrics
text: IDLES POP POP POP Lyrics [Verse 1]FreudenfreudeJoy on joy (joy on joy)CheerleaderHappy boy (happy boy)Strong like bullVu-vu-vulnerable (vulnerable)Keep my people upThat's my toolFreudenfreudeHappy boyTop seederLucky koiHeat seeker of a missile smileDon't let pricks take your inch to a mileFreudenfreudeBada bing (bada bing)She's a freight train, manWatch her swingHoly water eyesSoft skinBricks and mortarHorizon begins[Chorus]SunbeamsOh, sunbeamsLike God from your faceSunbeamsOh, sunbeamsLike God from your faceYou might also likeRoyIDLESA GospelIDLESIDEA 01IDLES[Verse 2]Gold sugarHues bright when the salt is purerHold tight (hold tight)Hold me to the bunsen burnerAnd let the wavesCrash in[Chorus]SunbeamsOh, sunbeamsLike God from your faceSunbeamsOh, sunbeamsLike God from your face[Verse 3]FreudenfreudeDopamineDance with time, my boyI'm a fiendWatch the night swing byHold the sceneHold a flame, my boyI'm a dreamFreudenfreudeHot like fireDocile prophetPuts a tune to my smileSend it upLike smoke to the skyDrink my water 'til the river runs dryFreudenfreudeSister's loveHold the swordSo I'm soft to the touchHold the phoneHold the clutchWatch me flyHold a mirrorTo my Mother's crying eyes[Chorus]SunbeamsOh, sunbeamsLike God from your faceSunbeamsOh, sunbeamsLike God from your face IDLES POP POP POP Lyrics Meaning The lyrics of POP POP POP by IDLES explore themes of joy, resilience, and the pursuit of happiness amidst life's challenges. In the verses, the narrator expresses a sense of inner strength and positivity (Joy on joy, Happy boy), juxtaposed with vulnerability (Vu-vu-vulnerable). They emphasize the importance of uplifting others and staying resilient in the face of adversity. References to sunbeams evoke imagery of divine presence and light, symbolizing hope and positivity. IDLES POP POP POP Lyrics Details Album IDLES Release Date 2024 Available on YouTube Music IDLES POP POP POP Lyrics Facts Joy and Resilience: The song celebrates joy (Joy on joy) and resilience amidst challenges, emphasizing the importance of staying positive and uplifting others (Keep my people up).Empowerment and Identity: The lyrics convey a sense of empowerment and self-assurance, with references to being strong yet vulnerable (Strong like bull, vu-vu-vulnerable). The narrator embraces their identity and encourages others to do the same.Imagery and Symbolism: The use of vivid imagery, such as sunbeams likened to a divine presence, and metaphors like freudenfreude (German for joy) and gold sugar, adds depth and symbolism to the song.
